LGTM ACK abc147de95fb294a2c0a3105695e708517010322

In the longer run I think it makes sense to stop mentioning "64 bits" at all in user visible places, but this is the obvious change for now—wouldn't want to mess up things with registry keys and start menu entries.

> In the longer run I think it makes sense to stop mentioning "64 bits" at all in user visible places, but this is the obvious change for now—wouldn't want to mess up things with registry keys and start menu entries.

I agree. I kept this to the smallest possible, non-controversial change.
